name: We Sleep Under Trees
description:
Escape isn’t an option for everyone.

We Sleep Under Trees is a narrative game about two women coping with a breakup after one of them decides to move to the moon.

Moz has been forced into an uncomfortable relationship with a man that she can’t get out of, harboring resentment for the one who abandoned her.
Lilac wanders her newfound sanctuary and finds small things that make her happy, but she ultimately yearns for the one she left behind.

This game contains mentions of death, suicide, illness, and homophobic slurs.
